code: import _toConsumableArray from"/home/king/Desktop/lindabirthday/client/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray";import{REMOVE_ALERT,SET_ALERT}from'../Types';var alertReducer=function alertReducer(state,action){switch(action.type){case SET_ALERT:{return[].concat(_toConsumableArray(state),[action.payload]);}case REMOVE_ALERT:{return state.filter(function(alert){return alert.id!==action.payload;});}default:return state;}};export default alertReducer;
